Text:
thx for your effort =)
Just to check with you, is your fixes based on "http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5941319/[Wheel_of_Time_13]_-_Towers_of_Midnight_(v1.0)_(best_version)" or is it based on the "original" scanlation?

I am still downloading it now, will comment as soon as I began reading it, probably in a day or 2.
Thank you so much!  This is far and away the best version out there.

I am currently reading it and it is a highly readable version. There maybe numerous typos, punctuation errors(e.g. missing inverted commas, fullstops etc.) but on a whole I can read it with understanding.
